settings.image_alt: The Best Deals AreOne Click Away

settings.sub_title: Bereiten Sie sich auf Halloween vor, indem Sie noch heute eine Geschenkkarte mit 20% Rabatt erwerben.

settings.code:
<style>
    .shopify-section {
        background: #141416;
        margin-top: -1px;
    }

    .cursor-btns {
        position: sticky;
        top: 0;
        z-index: 2;
        background: none !important;
    }

    .cursor-btns .cursor-btn {
        color: #999 !important;
        background: #141416 !important;
        border: 1px solid #666;
    }

    .cursor-btns .cursor-btn:hover,
    .cursor-btns .cursor-btn.swiper-slide-thumb-active {
        color: #000 !important;
        background: #03F2A6 !important;
        border: 1px solid #03F2A6;
        font-weight: 600;
    }

    .tabs_products_list .contant,
    .ug-product-list {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw !important;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

   
    .ug-product-buy-btn {
        background: #FFF !important;
        color: #000 !important;
    }

    .ug-product-buy-btn:hover {
        background: #03F2A6 !important;
    }

    .ug-product-learn-btn {
        border: 1px solid #fff !important;
        color: #fff !important;
    }

    .ug-product-learn-btn:hover {
        border: 1px solid #03F2A6 !important;
        color: #03F2A6 !important;
    }
    .ug-product-title {
            font-weight: 600 !important;
            color: #FFF !important;
        }

        .ug-product-price {
            color: #03F2A6 !important;
        }
    .ug-product-list-title,
    .svg_title h2 {
        color: #fff !important;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 5px;
    }

    .svg_title svg {
        display: none;
    }

    .ug-product-sale {
        top: -0.625vw !important;
        left: -0.417vw !important;

    }

    .ug-product-sale-text {
        width: 2.865vw;
        color: #000 !important;
        top: 22% !important;
        left: 4% !important;
        font-weight: 700 !important;
        font-size: 1.25vw !important;
        transform: rotateZ(315deg) !important;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .ug-product-sale-text-percent {
        font-size: 0.833vw !important;
        font-weight: 600 !important;
    }

    .tabs_products_list .ug_product_code {
        padding: 0.25vw 1.875vw 0.25vw 1vw;
    }

    .ug-product-list-title::before,
    .svg_title h2::before {
        content: '';
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/lightning_left.webp?v=1697635642')center center no-repeat;
        background-size: 100% 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        width: 1.979vw;
        height: 2.8125vw;
    }

    .ug-product-list-title::after,
    .svg_title h2::after {
        content: '';
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/lightning_right.webp?v=1697635854')center center no-repeat;
        background-size: 100% 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        width: 1.979vw;
        height: 2.8125vw;
    }
    #sainta-day .ug-product-review{
        display: none;
    }
    @media (min-width:768px) {
        .ug-product-title {
            font-size: 1.042vw!important;
            line-height: 1.5625vw!important;
            height: 3vw!important;
        }

        .ug-product-price {
            font-size: 1.354vw!important;
        }
        .ug-product-compare_at_price{
            font-size: 0.833vw!important;
        }
    }
    @media (max-width:768px) {

        .tabs_products_list .contant,
        .ug-product-list {
            max-width: 100% !important;
        }

        .ug-product-list-title {
            margin-bottom: 30px !important;
        }
        .ug-product-sale{
            top: -1.5vw !important;
            left: -1vw !important;
        }
        .ug-product-sale-text {
            font-size: 4.267vw !important;
            width: 10.667vw;
            top: 20% !important;
            left: -5% !important;
        }

        .ug-product-sale-text-percent {
            font-size: 12px!important;
        }

        .ug_product_code {
            background: none;
            padding: 0;
            margin: 10px 0 0 0;
        }

        .ug_product_code p {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: #999;
        }

        .ug_product_code button {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 500;
        }

        .cursor-btns .swiper-wrapper {
            justify-content: flex-start !important;
        }

        .cursor-btns .cursor-btn {
            padding: 0 !important;
            height: 40px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .svg_title h2 {
            font-size: 24px !important;
            padding: 0 0 15px 0 !important;
        }

        .svg_title p {
            display: none;
        }

        .ug-product-list-title::before,
        .svg_title h2::before {
            width: 8vw;
            height: 11.200vw;
        }

        .ug-product-list-title::after,
        .svg_title h2::after {
            width: 8vw;
            height: 11.200vw;
        }
    }
</style>
